recipe_name: Onion rings with spicy red pepper sauce
author: Phil Vickery
method: For the onion rings, mix together the flour and water to make the batter consistency of single cream. Heat the oil in a deep, heavy-based saucepan. Dip the onion rings into the batter and then drop in batches into the hot oil for 2-3 minutes. (CAUTION: Hot oil can be very dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Remove and drain on kitchen paper. For the sauce, place all of the ingredients in a saucepan and bring to the boil over a medium heat. Let simmer for 2-3 minutes. Using a hand blender, blend ingredients until smooth. Serve with the onion rings.
ingredients: 110g/4 oz self-raising flour,  water, to mix ,  1 onion, sliced,  hot oil, to deep fry,  1 red pepper, de-seeded and chopped,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  sea salt,  50ml/1¾fl oz double cream,  ½ vegetable stock cube
